issue.title: [Doc] Update crossbow docs for archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12573](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12573). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/crossbow.html , there are many references to running `crossbow.py`. These should be updated to showcase `archery crossbow` instead.

Also, it would be nice to mention that you can submit jobs from Github PR comments using `@github-actions crossbow submit ...`
